## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G30980](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G30980)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>DROP2, LRL2</u>
- **Gene Name:** DEFECTIVE REGION OF POLLEN 2, LJRHL1-like 2
- **Description:**   LJRHL1-like 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT4G30980.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT4G30980.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT4G30980.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT4G30980.2)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [drop1 drop2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Pollen tubes lack sperm cells. Pollen grains are capable of germinating, tubes can grow and respond to female signals during the early stages of journey toward the ovule, and can rupture after entering the ovule.
